mapper.insert:
select rvSeq.nextval from dual
insert into review(rvNo, rvDate, rvTitle, rvContent, rvImg,rvStar, contentId, addr, facltNm, lineIntro, tel, homePage, imgUrl,mapX, mapY, memNo, memId) values(#{rvNo}, #{rvDate}, #{rvTitle}, #{rvContent}, #{rvImg},#{rvStar}, #{contentId}, #{addr}, #{facltNm}, #{lineIntro}, #{tel}, #{homePage}, #{imgUrl},#{mapX}, #{mapY}, #{memNo}, #{memId})
mapper.update: update review set rvTtile=#{rvTitle}, rvContent=#{rvContent}, rvImg=#{rvImg}, rvDate=#{rvDate} where memNo=#{memNo}
mapper.delete: delete review where rvNo=#{rvNo} and memNo=#{memNo}
mapper.select: select * from review order by rvNo desc
